channel.title: Im stuck with opening my server file
channel.description:
Hi, I was looking at The Gaurdian's tutorial and I got a bit confused on this bit:
Chapter 3: Compiling/Running Now go into your server folder, you should see .java files, and .class files. Locate client.java, and open it with Notepad. This is your main folder for programming the things in your server. The other files are more technical, and you shouldn't mess with them until you learn java a bit. Now, in your client.java, use ctrl + f, to find the name of the server source you downloaded, and change the name ONLY within the quote marks, otherwise the compiler will tell you about errors.
I don't know how to open the server folder, if anyone can help, it would be brilliant! Thank you

item.title: Im stuck with opening my server file
item.dc:creator: @King_Evil926 King Evil926
item.description:
@King_Evil926 wrote:

oh ok thanks thats helped Thanks loads ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 08:48:00 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for double posting, but I can’t open the folder and im using UnRar
Any help?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 08:49:31 AM[/size][hr]Oi Mod Nate bitch, no need to be sarcastic…

Read full topic

@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Ok say you downloaded Satan isle V2 open that folder.

Look for the notepad Client or client.java in your satan isle V2 folder.

Thats what he means.

item.title: Im stuck with opening my server file
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

Ok heres my Tut

[b]Part 1[/b]
---------
Move your mouse over your server file.

[b]Part 2[/b]
---------
Search your mouse for:
[code]Left Click Button[/code]
Now once you find it press it two times! No more no less!
[b]Part 3[/b]
----------
You are in the server file now you may follow the rest of Gayrdians Tut.

~Enjoy,
    ~Mod Nate~

Read full topic
